ing: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch strips
1 (1.25 ounce) envelope dry chicken gravy mix
des: "A combination of excellent flavors which blend into a wonderful, rich sauce for your chicken!  Serve with a simple green salad and focaccia for a feast!"
ins:
In a slow cooker, combine the chicken, bacon bits, olives, tomatoes, mushrooms, gravy mix, wine, mustard, and vinegar. Mix together.
Cover slow cooker, and cook on Low setting for 6 to 8 hours.
